Key.English: ALiVE Newsfeed direct to in Game
Key.Chinesesimp: 将ALiVE新闻源接入到游戏中

Key.English: Allow the option to get the latest ALiVE News in Game
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许选择在游戏中获取最新的ALiVE新闻

Key.English: Enable the dispaly of the ALiVE Newsfeed in game
Key.Chinesesimp: 在游戏中启用ALiVE新闻源的显示

Key.English: Disable the dispaly of the ALiVE Newsfeed in game
Key.Chinesesimp: 在游戏中禁用ALiVE新闻源的显示

Key.English: Only one newsfeed module can be used
Key.Chinesesimp: 只能使用一个新闻源模块
